place_description: Change Please is where social enterprise and coffee expertise blend. We train and employ people experiencing homelessness as baristas and put 100% of our profits towards giving our employees fair wage jobs, housing, therapy support, childcare, healthcare, onward job opportunities and more.

reviews_data.review_text: Really good coffee!
By far the best coffee I've ever had and I've tried the majority of coffee shops around the area. The barista also makes it enjoyable normally leaving with a smile or laughing my way out the door.
Concept is great. Coffee is great. Not comfortable atmosphere due to service.
Great coffee for a great cause!
Super nice and casual cafe! Great coffee and a great cause. The staff is very friendly and dog loving!

I really liked it here and am bummed that it's so far away from my home. Every business and learning lab is based on sustainability. You can even see a bunch of fish through the window in their aquaponics room. It felt nice to be in a place where the associates and customers care about the world and want to make a difference. It gave me hope that I have not had about climate change in a while. My iced caramel latte was quickly ingested from how refreshing and yummy it was, and my Dad's Americano was good but not the best he has had in his lifetime. The barista was kind enough to explain to me what the place is all about and I enjoyed perusing their sustainable gifts for sale. They also have wine, beer, and kombucha, so if you are not into coffee, there is still something for you. I wish I had time to sit down and enjoy my drink there but was in a hurry. It is very spacious and full of light, which is my idea of a great and chill hangout. I will go back!
Great place to grab some coffee, beer or wine. Not crowded and plenty of parking. Check out the cool stuff going on at the Innovation Barn while there.
Great coffee and friendly place.

What a wonderful hidden gem in CLT. I LOVE the coffee and espresso/  flat whites. Free wifi. Great quiet, cozy little work space. Plenty of parking and EV charging.  Take a tour of the innovation barn.. say hey to Bauer the Sheepadoodle! Great place! It's like the "Cheers" of coffee shops. They have a great mission , too. Fighting homelessness.
Good coffee. Great cause. The place has a cool vibe with all the other activity and organizations in the same building.
It was great they have a sweet Nuova Simonelli White eagle. It's a 4 boiler system. Also the coffee was real good and the lady was very nice
Simply amazing coffee and cause.
Super cute coffee shop inside of The Innovation Barn!! Tons of indoor and outdoor seating and great service
Love this place! The coffee shop is beautiful with lots of natural light and a great view of the city. The coffee is amazing -- can't wait to see what else they add to the menu!

Not only a delicious cup of coffee on your way to work. This cafe feels like a warm hug. I felt energized inside and completely relaxed outside on the friendly patio with Adirondack chairs and fire rings. The cafe is a perfect addition to the inspirational community located at the Innovation Barn. Don't forget to pick up a bag of coffee to brew and share at home!

Visited the other day, GREAT place!! Enjoyed some wine and the atmosphere was incredible. They had live music, the staff was very attentive, and the coffee was also to die for. Definitely will be going back!!

Visited for the first time yesterday, greeted warmly by Ryan and the staff. My daughter and I enjoyed a glass of wine, and later she ordered a honey vanilla latte that was delicious!  Great space, love the outdoor seating areas. We will definitely pay them a visit again soon!

Great quality coffee and friendly staff. It's in a great location with an amazing outdoor space to enjoy your coffee/tea. Best of all, they're helping combat homelessness by giving opportunities to the people in the community looking for a second chance.

Definitely worth checking out!

What an amazing place to sit and enjoy coffee and a pastry, all while knowing you are helping to change the lives of others. Their service was phenomenal, the atmosphere both inside and out is inspiring, and to know you are helping people make a REAL change in their lives.... well, it just felt really good!

Change Please has such a great concept, check them out!
This is such a lovely coffee concept shop that has opened in Charlotte. Great atmosphere, kind staff, and of course excellent coffee!

The staff are amazing and so incredibly friendly! The coffee is perfect and 100% of profits go to helping homeless people get a job and improve their way of life. Even if you don't drink coffee they have excellent tea available and the atmosphere is outstanding!

The coffee is fantastic, and the staff are all so lovely! This place has an amazing atmosphere and all the profits go towards helping homeless people! It is one of the best cafes in Charlotte, with amazing coffee and such a great mission!
